segments.text: I am observing a kitchen scene, quite ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman stands at the sink, diligently drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is entirely on her task, almost meditative.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: However, I can clearly see the sink is overflowing dramatically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water gushes over the front edge, streaming down the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a rapidly expanding puddle on the floor around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to notice the cold water soaking her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains completely neutral, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry someone might slip on that growing pool of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The situation is quickly becoming quite hazardous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing how oblivious she appears to be to the immediate danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's lost in thought, completely detached from her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR
